mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wemovies.onscreen_movie (title, genres, overview, cinema, screen, start_day, end_day, showtime) values (#{title}, #{genres}, #{overview}, #{cinema}, #{screen}, #{start_day}, #{end_day}, #{showtime})
mapper.select: SELECT cinema, screen, start_day, end_day, showtime FROM wemovies.onscreen_movie where title = #{title}
